```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# load data sets
full_data <- tibble()
for (file in list.files('data')){
  full_data <- bind_rows(full_data, read.csv(paste0('data/', file)))
}
```

```{r}
glimpse(full_data)
```

```{r}
summary(full_data)
```
